item.description:
Schedule it in now folks...a midsummer's Sierra Club & Beer event!
Come meet a bunch of like-minded people at Cambridge Commmon on Wed., August 2nd at 6:30 p.m. What are we going to do? Relax and have a drink for starters! Also, learn about what's happening locally, meet some leaders in the Boston Sierra Club, and if something strikes a chord in you, find out about what you can do.
Cash bar, limited free appetizers

Wednesday, August 2, 6:30 p.m.
Cambridge Common
T directions - take the Red Line to Porter Sq. and walk ~5 blocks down Mass. Ave toward Harvard Sq. Cambridge Common on your right in between Sacramento and Wendell streets.

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club & Beer!
